VIEW_DESCRIPTION: Displays a specified card or banner
NAME: Name:
NEED_SILVER_MORPH: You need at least **1 Silver** to use this feature
ENTER_VALID_ANGLE: Please enter a valid angle between **1** and **360** degrees
VIEW_EXTRA_INFO: If used without a card code, it will instead display your most recently obtained card. You can use the buttons to view stats, change the font, convert the card to 3D, or morph it.
